lom:description.lom:string:
"This teaching and learning package (TLP) provides an introduction to piezoelectric materials.On completion of this tutorial you should:
* Understand the atomic basis for piezoelectricity. * Understand how this basis scales up to a full effect on the macro scale. * Understand how piezoelectrics tie in with ferroelectrics and how their properties arise from the same basis. * Understand how the properties of piezoelectrics are put to use both industrially and commercially."
